itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Indianapolis Colts General Manager Chris Ballard to discuss his successful 2020 NFL Draft, how he deals with drafting positions with an already existing player, why they decided to sign Phillip Rivers as their new QB, the amount of prep it takes for players to get ready for their Sunday games, Ballard weighs in on how the 2020 NFL season may be played during quarantimes, and tells us why he’s thankful players don’t call him regarding the draft.
